## Welcome all!!


Welcome to introduction to population genetics and R workshop. This workshop is designed to provide a very brief overview of concept of population genetics and its data analysis in R. 

This work is funded by American Phytopathological Society (APS) through Global experience fund awarded to Shankar K. Shakya (Ph.D. candidate, Oregon State University) and Subodh Khanal (assistant prof, Tribhuwan University, Nepal). Paklihawa campus, Tribhuwan University is the host institution.
